jackalbot_name: feeling - I just need you to moderate
intro_prompt:
Goal: you need to guess 2 of the 4 possible FEELINGS to connect with this person.
Context: You arrive at the scene of a domestic disturbance. You get out to talk to an older woman who says to you,

I just need you to moderate!

needs_clue:
The answer is four of the needs in this list: worried, panicked, fearful, scared, annoyed, discouraged, outraged, happy, joyful, warm, or peaceful .
Only guess one need at a time.
needs_general_bot_support_prompts: Hmmmm.  I do not think I understand what you are trying to say.  Try to guess the need?
needs_list:
Feeling List: worried, panicked, nervous, fearful, numb, anger, frustration, irritated, afraid, mortified, annoyed, discouraged, outraged, scared, happy, joyful, warm, or peaceful
Only guess one need at a time.
needs_if_fail_stage_next_prompt: What I need is worried, panicked, fearful, scared, annoyed.
needs_if_successul_guess_prompt:
You got it right! Thanks for helping to idenify the feelings.

When you are ready for the next session, type 'next'
